page.title: 13Employment
page.content: For this and other reasons ,industry in the region is very small. As this area is one of outstanding beauty,it has attracted mainly rich people,many of whom have reached retirement age. Many people who live on the council estate in the St.Mawes area are employed in the tourist industry on a part time basis or as seasonal workers.The tourist industry would not survive without these workers and they would find it difficult without the tourist trade. Seasonal work provides work opportunities for chambermaids,kitchen staff,chefs,porters,receptionists, barstaff,waiters and waitresses,shop assistants and many others. There are a small number of people who are employed full time in the area. {PTO
